ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned about different conceptions of color and its functions in art and society. I learned about various properties of color (namely hue, value, and saturation/chroma) and how to mix colors effectively.
We learned a lot about color theory/relationships and color mixing, mainly through in class exercises using color-aid cards and gouache paints

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Loved this class so much, I learned so much and had fun.

strengths: this is one of the most laid-back classes I've ever taken. The classroom learning environment was really accepting and encouraging, and we had plenty of room to explore what we found interesting. The class felt low stakes and low pressure which I really appreciated. Homework assignments were minimal and very reasonable and interesting.
weaknesses: class discussions of readings often felt lacking, and class time itself sometimes felt like it moved too slowly
a really great course!! the in-class work periods were often very relaxing and fun and Kern and Rafael always gave great feedback/advice

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! As someone with no art background, I loved being able to take part in an art class without having my lack of artistic ability hinder me.

Yes. Kern is an amazing professor. And the class is interesting, fun, and laid back. A perfect combination for any college course. The class will teach you a lot about color and help with color mixing and perception.
